sqlMap.select: SELECT RE.REPORT_SN ,RE.MILESTONE_SN ,RE.REPORT_SE ,RE.TASK_SN ,TA.TASK_NO ,RE.INSTT_CODE ,IO.NAME1 ,TO_CHAR(RE.OPRTN_DE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS OPRTN_DE ,RE.CHARGER_ID ,US.USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(RE.FRST_CREAT_DE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS FRST_CREAT_DE FROM CTMS_ST_REPORT_MAIN RE ,EDC_CR_TASK TA ,CM_INSTT IT ,SAP_BCNC_INFO IO ,CM_USER US ,CTMS_ST_MILESTONE MI WHERE RE.TASK_SN = TA.TASK_SN(+) AND RE.INSTT_CODE = IT.INSTT_CODE(+) AND IT.KUNNR = IO.KUNNR AND RE.CHARGER_ID = US.USER_ID(+) AND RE.MILESTONE_SN = MI.SN AND RE.TASK_SN = #TASK_SN# AND RE.REPORT_SE IN ('I00') AND RE.USE_AT = 'Y' AND MI.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY RE.INSTT_CODE, RE.FRST_CREAT_DE DESC

SELECT RE.REPORT_SN ,RE.MILESTONE_SN ,BC.NAME1 ,US.USER_NM ,RE.TASK_SN ,RE.REPORT_SE ,RE.JOB_SE ,RE.INSTT_CODE ,RE.RSRCHMAN_ID ,RE.PURPS ,RE.ITEM_A ,RE.ITEM_B ,RE.ITEM_C ,RE.ITEM_D ,RE.ITEM_E ,RE.ITEM_F ,RE.ITEM_G ,RE.ITEM_H ,RE.COL_A ,RE.COL_B ,RE.COL_C ,RE.COL_D ,RE.COL_E ,RE.COL_F ,RE.COL_H ,TO_CHAR(RE.OPRTN_DE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS OPRTN_DE ,RE.SETLE_NO ,RE.CHARGER_ID ,RE.REPORT_TYPE ,RE.REMARK_A FROM CTMS_ST_REPORT_MAIN RE ,CM_INSTT IT ,SAP_BCNC_INFO BC ,CM_USER US WHERE RE.INSTT_CODE = IT.INSTT_CODE AND IT.KUNNR = BC.KUNNR AND RE.RSRCHMAN_ID = US.USER_ID AND RE.MILESTONE_SN = #MILESTONE_SN# AND RE.TASK_SN = #TASK_SN# AND RE.REPORT_SE = #REPORT_SE# AND RE.INSTT_CODE = #INSTT_CODE# AND RE.USE_AT = 'Y'
SELECT REPORT_SN ,MILESTONE_SN ,TASK_SN ,REPORT_TYPE ,ITEM_SE ,ITEM_VALUE ,SUBJECT_CO ,REPORT_TYPE ,TO_CHAR(DTE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS DTE FROM CTMS_ST_REPORT_ITEM WHERE REPORT_SN = #REPORT_SN#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CTMS_ST_REPORT_MAIN SET REMARK_A = #REMARK_A# ,ITEM_A = #ITEM_A# ,ITEM_B = #ITEM_B# ,ITEM_C = #ITEM_C# ,ITEM_D = #ITEM_D# ,ITEM_E = #ITEM_E# ,ITEM_F = #ITEM_F# ,ITEM_G = #ITEM_G# ,ITEM_H = #ITEM_H# ,COL_A = #COL_A# ,COL_B = #COL_B# ,COL_C = #COL_C# ,COL_D = #COL_D# ,COL_E = #COL_E# ,COL_F = #COL_F# ,COL_H = #COL_H# ,LAST_UPDT_DE = SYSDATE ,LAST_UPDUSR = #LAST_UPDUSR# ,OPRTN_DE = TO_DATE(#OPRTN_DE#, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE REPORT_SN = #REPORT_SN#
UPDATE CTMS_ST_REPORT_ITEM SET ITEM_VALUE = #ITEM_VALUE# ,LAST_UPDT_DE = SYSDATE ,LAST_UPDUSR = #LAST_UPDUSR# WHERE REPORT_SN = #REPORT_SN# AND ITEM_SE = #ITEM_SE#
UPDATE CTMS_ST_REPORT_MAIN SET SETLE_NO = #SETLE_NO# ,LAST_UPDT_DE = SYSDATE ,LAST_UPDUSR = #LAST_UPDUSR# WHERE REPORT_SN = #REPORT_SN#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.SANCTN_CODE , FN_GET_COMMONCODE('COM003', A.SANCTN_CODE, #LOCALE#) AS SANCTN_CODE_NM , A.SANCTN_NO , A.SANCTNER_ID , C.USER_NM SANCTNER_NM , E.DEPT_NM , A.STTUS_CODE , FN_GET_COMMONCODE('COM004', A.STTUS_CODE, #LOCALE#) AS STTUS_CODE_NM , A.REQUST_NO , TO_CHAR(A.SANCTN_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') SANCTN_DT , A.SANCTN_COMMENT , A.USE_YN , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_CREDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FRST_CREDE , A.REGIST_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') LAST_UPDDE , A.UPDATE_ID , (SELECT X.USER_NM FROM CM_USER X WHERE X.USER_ID = A.UPDATE_ID) UPDATE_NM , A.SANCTN_ORDR , A.STTUS_ORDR , B.REQUST_NM , B.STTUS_CODE REQUST_STTUS_CODE , FN_GET_COMMONCODE('COM005', B.STTUS_CODE, #LOCALE#) AS STTUS_CODE_NM , DAMO_DEC(C.EMAIL) AS EMAIL FROM CM_SANCTN_PROCESS A , CM_SANCTN_REQUST B , CM_USER C , CM_JOBUSER D , CM_DEPTINFO E WHERE A.REQUST_NO = B.REQUST_NO AND A.SANCTNER_ID = C.USER_ID AND C.USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND D.DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND A.REQUST_NO = #REQUEST_NO# ORDER BY A.STTUS_ORDR, A.SANCTN_ORDR
